resources.string: In this equation you should simplify by subtracting X from each side.
In this equation you should simplify by adding X from each side.

Welcome to Equation Balancer! We're going to show you how to balance and solve equations! 

To contine, click "continue" below.
Here you can see the equation that you will be solving! It will be different each time!
Here is your equation balancing scale. Each side of the scale represents each side of the equation separated by the equal sign.
Use these buttons to add or subtract X\'s, or numbers from each side of the scale.
Once you\'ve built the equation shown, \"Ready to Solve\" will light up. Press \"Ready to Solve\" to lock in your answer.
You can use these arrows to look back at earliersteps of the equation.
If you ever get stuck and want a new equation tap the home button. You will get a new equation next time.
If you accidentally add too many blocks, long press on the block you want to remove and press the \'X\' button.
As you change the equation, your new equation will be shown here.
